TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Sagaran, title = Sagaran, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sagaran} }

S.FORM: Sagaran i Pingtung a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Sagaran. u kasalumaluma' nu Sagaran sa, 195 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 698 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 662 ku tademaw, pakalatu 95%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 36 ku tademaw, pakalatu 5%. u kasabinacadan, Paiwan 89%, Rukai 2%, Bunun 1%, Amis 1%, zumazuma 1%.

Sagaran i Pingtong a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Sagaran. o kasalomaloma' no Sagaran sa, 195 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 698 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 662 ko tademaw, pakalato 95%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 36 ko tademaw, pakalato 5%. o kasabinacadan, Paiwan 89%, Rokai 2%, Bonon 1%, Amis 1%, zomazoma 1%.
